alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 12:29PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Routt and southeastern Moffat Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1228 PM MDT, Satellite and the lightning detection network was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Craig, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Satellite and the lightning detection network indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Craig around 1240 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hayden. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 81 and 109. Colorado 13 between mile markers 72 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
